course_details: Learn the basics of Python programming, including variables, data types, functions, loops, and control flow.
Learn the basics of Java programming, including variables, data types, functions, loops, and control flow.

course_name: Web Development with JavaScript and HTML/CSS
course_details: Learn how to build web applications using JavaScript and HTML/CSS.
Learn the fundamentals of data structures and algorithms, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.
Learn the concepts of object-oriented programming, such as classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.
Learn the principles of software engineering, such as software design, testing, and deployment.
Learn the fundamentals of machine learning, including supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and reinforcement learning.
Learn the fundamentals of artificial intelligence, including search algorithms, logic, and knowledge representation.
Learn the fundamentals of blockchain programming, including smart contracts and decentralized applications.
